hackathon-description-text: At the 2017 DocuSign Hackathon in San Francisco, developers will be creating ground-breaking eSignature implementations and competing for a number of prizes, all of which include cash and Google Homes!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Director, Strategic Technology Partnerships, Google Cloud

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This prize will be awarded to the team that creates the best project at the hackathon. Every project will be considered.
Criteria: Build an end-to-end paperless solution for Techbridge Girls using eSignature, Mobile, Sign & Pay and DocuSign for SalesForce.
Criteria: Build the best mobile app that integrates DocuSign.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Implementation of DocuSign on Mobile

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Criteria: Build the best project that integrates DocuSign's Sign and Pay.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Implementation of DocuSign Sign & Pay

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Criteria: Build the best Google Cloud Platform app that integrates DocuSign.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=333 O'Farrell St, San Francisco, CA 94102, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is this project a new approach to and clever implementation for how a paper process can be eliminated or how DocuSign can otherwise be used?
How throughly implemented is this project?
Was a technically difficult problem solved? Is the solution well engineered for the chosen problem?
Is the hack intuitive to use?

hackathon-location-address: 333 O'Farrell St, San Francisco, CA 94102, USA
hackathon-description-header: The Official Hackathon of the 2017 DocuSign Momentum Conference
hackathon-location-description: Hilton San Francisco Union Square - Tower 3, Conference Ballroom 6
